text: @Jim_Jordan Trump didn't handle COVID19 like he should've, & they blow off the science & the medical people. What makes either of U think they're going 2 handle the coming 2nd wave any differently & it's coming within 4 weeks! It's gonna make the first wave look like a F'n sunny day.
